thread.title: Lovely Hotel with Central Location
thread.title_full: Lovely Hotel with Central Location - Review of Hotel du Triangle d'Or, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: ellexander
title: Lovely Hotel with Central Location
text: Excellent little hotel with such friendly staff. We absolutely loved the music theme throughout the hotel. For the price we paid, we did not expect much so we were pleasantly surprised with how tasteful the d√©cor and furnishings were. There is also an ipod dock should you wish to listen to music and a mini bar. Yes the rooms are a little on the small size but it is Paris after all. The hotel is 5 minutes walk from Madeline metro station and lovely little cafes and a Carrefour supermarket all within 10mins walk. Do not hesitate to book here!
